articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: McLaren: Norris could have done nothing more to win F1 Spanish GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Why McLaren says nothing more Lando Norris could have done to win F1’s Spanish Grand Prix
articles.content:
Lando Norris may have been kicking himself for losing out in Formula 1s Spanish Grand Prix, but the team reckons there was nothing more he could have done.
Norris was left frustrated with himself th… [+3653 chars]
